CustomObject.description: Indicates the relationship of the Blue Partner SFID to a State/Region field on Account/Contact. The logic can be read like this: 'When an agency/partner relationship is created, find the Partner Id in the custom setting and then update the field indicated in API_Name_of_field__c to TRUE. Update the field on both the Agency record and its contact records."
CustomObject.label: Blue Partner Fields for Sharing
